label: Relative Log Expression (RLE)
info: The log-ratio of the read count of each gene to the median read count across samples

visr.param.addvalue.label: Add number
visr.param.addvalue.info: The number to add to all counts (necessary if there is 0 in data)

visr.param.scale.label: Scale by library sizes
visr.param.scale.info: Calculate normalization factors and scale the raw library sizes.
